root.title: bahia cocoa review
root.body: shower continu throughout week bahia cocoa zone allevi drought sinc earli januari improv prospect come temporao although normal humid level restor comissaria smith sai weekli review dry period mean temporao will late year arriv week end februari 22 155,221 bag 60 kilo make cumul total season 5.93 mln 5.81 stage last year seem cocoa deliv earlier consign includ arriv figur comissaria smith sai still doubt much old crop cocoa still avail harvest practic come end total bahia crop estim around 6.4 mln bag sale stand almost 6.2 mln hundr thousand bag still hand farmer middleman export processor doubt much cocoa fit export shipper now experi dificulti obtain bahia superior certif view lower qualiti recent week farmer sell good part cocoa hold consign comissaria smith sai spot bean price rise 340 350 cruzado per arroba 15 kilo bean shipper reluct offer nearbi shipment limit sale book march shipment 1,750 1,780 dlr per tonn port name new crop sale also light open port june juli go 1,850 1,880 dlr 35 45 dlr new york juli aug sept 1,870 1,875 1,880 dlr per tonn fob routin sale butter make march april sell 4,340 4,345 4,350 dlr april mai butter go 2.27 time new york mai june juli 4,400 4,415 dlr aug sept 4,351 4,450 dlr 2.27 2.28 time new york sept oct dec 4,480 dlr 2.27 time new york dec comissaria smith sai destin u. covert currenc area uruguai open port cake sale regist 785 995 dlr march april 785 dlr mai 753 dlr aug 0.39 time new york dec oct dec buyer u. argentina uruguai convert currenc area liquor sale limit march april sell 2,325 2,380 dlr june juli 2,375 dlr 1.25 time new york juli aug sept 2,400 dlr 1.25 time new york sept oct dec 1.25 time new york dec comissaria smith sai total bahia sale current estim 6.13 mln bag 1986 87 crop 1.06 mln bag 1987 88 crop final figur period februari 28 expect publish brazilian cocoa trade commiss carniv end middai februari 27
